ygData.subject: Re: Petition about faction hit
ygData.msgSnippet: I mentioned this before, but I had logged into Everquest, and even had my weapons in the Freeport bank.  I was simply mastering my brewing trade in the bar by
ygData.messageBody:
I mentioned this before, but I had logged into Everquest, and even had my
weapons in the Freeport bank. I was simply mastering my brewing trade in
the bar by the bank. During this time, (NOT singing or playing) received
faction notices for people killing freeport NPCs! Yet I have noticed no
faction difference from the Freeport militia, and even had three or four
notices over a few hours. Since I'm not using the sewers to navigate the
town, I'm not worried as of yet, unsure if I really had a faction adjustment
or not. Perhaps we receive the notice but don't actually get adjusted?

Understand, not singing or playing, even in another building in the market
square where the battle is taking place! Best I can come up with, perhaps I
had given a warrior free Fierce Brew and they had gone and slaughtered
someone under its influence.



Roop

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 8:54 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Petition about faction hit


>From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>
>
>I must agree. While in CB, I noticed that I was getting faction hit from
>Mobs that my group did not attack. I don't understand what happened to
>cause this, but I can be somewhat annoying.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: CMai [mailto:CMai@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 8:43 AM
>To: Eqbards (E-mail)
>Subject: [eqbards] Petition about faction hit
>
>
>I think that we should petition about our hit list. We should not be hated
>by every agressive npc that we meet. For example, i would be standing
>healing myself then suddenly these Orc's warriors from all the way from the
>distance would rush up and beat me to a pulp. or when they would not
attack
>the nearest pc but would travel the extra distance just to attack u.
>Another rant is we would get a faction hit for doing nothing at all except
>being near the MOB's death. Don't you all think this is very annoying.
>
>Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
>Hammerpaw and Samiam
>Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
>

>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?

>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
